thread.title_full: BRIEF-Evolis H1 net income rises by 51.6 pct to 4.7 million euros

title: BRIEF-Evolis H1 net income rises by 51.6 pct to 4.7 million euros
text:
BRIEF-Evolis H1 net income rises by 51.6 pct to 4.7 million euros Sept 22 
Sept 22 Evolis SA : 
* Reports H1 net income of 4.7 million euros ($5.23 million) versus 3.1 million euros a year ago (growth of 51.6 percent) 
* H1 operating profit rises by 54 percent to 7.1 million euros 
* Raises the sales target for full year 2015 to 25 percent, combined with historically high profit margins 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8986 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
